channel.title: Making Npc's Talk
channel.description: Hello everyone, i have downloaded fr33sc4p3 pkz source and i can get onto it easily, but i do not want the ppl saying"welcome to fr33sc4p3" and "Thug Life is offline" ect. Can someone please tell me how to change that?

item.title: Making Npc's Talk
item.dc:creator: @Mage_N_Range Mage N Range
item.description:
@Mage_N_Range wrote:

Hi, what you need to do is go into NPCHandler and search for what you want to change. For example:
welcome to fr33sc4p3! no range! search for that text, and change it, save, and compile good luck

~Mage

Read full topic
